stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: Documentation Generator
    [Infra_IngressController] --> idle
    idle --> idle : START
    idle --> discovering : GENERATE
    discovering --> generating_graphs : DONE [Infra_LoadBalancer) or op... && error is None]
    discovering --> generating_mermaid : DONE [Infra_EtcdCluster) or o... && error is None]
    discovering --> error : DONE [Infra_WorkerNode]
    generating_graphs --> generating_logic : DONE [Infra_RedisCache) or opt... && error is None]
    generating_graphs --> generating_mermaid : DONE [Infra_RedisCache) or o... && error is None]
    generating_logic --> generating_functions : DONE [Infra_LoadBalancer) or... && error is None]
    generating_logic --> generating_mermaid : DONE [Infra_IngressController) or o... && error is None]
    generating_functions --> generating_mermaid : DONE [Infra_WorkerNode) or o... && error is None]
    generating_mermaid --> updating_readmes : DONE [Infra_IngressController) or op... && error is None]
    generating_mermaid --> generating_report : DONE [Infra_LoadBalancer) or op... && error is None]
    updating_readmes --> generating_report : DONE [Infra_EtcdCluster) or op... && error is None]
    updating_readmes --> generating_dashboard : DONE [Infra_IngressController) or... && error is None]
    generating_report --> generating_dashboard : DONE [Infra_WorkerNode) or... && error is None]
    generating_report --> complete : DONE [Infra_IngressController]
    generating_dashboard --> complete : DONE [Infra_LoadBalancer]
    idle --> error : ERROR [Infra_WorkerNode]
    discovering --> error : ERROR [Infra_IngressController]
    generating_graphs --> error : ERROR [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    generating_mermaid --> error : ERROR [Infra_RedisCache]
    generating_logic --> error : ERROR [Infra_RedisCache]
    generating_report --> error : ERROR [Infra_WorkerNode]
    updating_readmes --> error : ERROR [Infra_IngressController]
    generating_functions --> error : ERROR [Infra_LoadBalancer]
    complete --> error : ERROR [Infra_IngressController]
    generating_dashboard --> error : ERROR [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    error --> idle : RESET
    complete --> idle : RESET
    complete --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    error --> [Infra_WorkerNode]
